about.title: Brand Strategy
about.subtitle: The strategic foundation of Kaos EUY! as Bandung's signature souvenir T-shirt brand.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.body: "Kaos EUY!" exists to become a symbol of local pride in Bandung by reflecting the city's uniqueness through high-quality T-shirts for tourists and local residents.

vision.title: Vision
vision.body: To become the most well-known and sought-after Bandung souvenir T-shirt brand for local and international tourists, while becoming a symbol of pride for Bandung people.

mission.title: Mission
mission.item1: Create T-shirt designs that reflect Bandung's uniqueness.
mission.item2: Maintain high-quality materials so products stay comfortable and durable.
mission.item3: Use digital platforms to make purchasing easier for tourists.
mission.item4: Support local communities through design and production collaboration.

positioning.title: Positioning
positioning.body: "Kaos EUY!" combines creative design, premium quality, and distinctive local Bandung elements to become the top choice for tourists and Bandung residents.

addedContext.title: Added Context
addedContext.kaosBody: "Kaos" is the Indonesian word for T-shirt.
addedContext.euyBody: "Euy" is a casual Sundanese expression, similar to saying "hey" or "yo" in a friendly way, representing warmth and local identity.

targetMarket.title: Target Market
targetMarket.demographic2: Occupation: students, young professionals, and tourists.
targetMarket.demographic3: Location: domestic tourists, Bandung residents, and online buyers across Indonesia.
targetMarket.psychographic1: Tourists looking for distinctive and unique souvenirs.
targetMarket.psychographic2: Local residents who take pride in Bandung.
targetMarket.psychographic3: People who value creativity, practicality, and local cultural uniqueness.

personality.title: Brand Personality
personality.item1Body: Use casual language and Bandung-style expressions.
personality.item4Body: Embed Bandung values into every product.

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.item3Body: Use distinctive Bandung elements such as Sundanese language and city icons.
coreValues.item4Body: Stay affordable for broad customer groups.

messageStrategy.title: Message Strategy
messageStrategy.mainBody: "Kaos EUY!" is not just a Bandung souvenir T-shirt, but also a symbol of local cultural pride.
messageStrategy.emotional1: "Wear Kaos EUY!, take Bandung wherever you go."
messageStrategy.functional1: Premium and comfortable materials with lasting quality.
messageStrategy.functional2: Distinctive Bandung designs that are unique and authentic.
messageStrategy.functional3: Available online and offline for easy purchasing.

differentiation.title: Brand Differentiation
differentiation.item1: Distinctive Bandung designs not found in other brands.
differentiation.item2: Strong local cultural elements: Sundanese phrases, city icons, and historical themes.
differentiation.item3: Digital accessibility that helps tourists purchase easily.
differentiation.item4: Eco-friendly packaging aligned with cultural values.

longTermGoal.title: Long-term Goal
longTermGoal.item1: Become a globally recognized Bandung souvenir brand.
longTermGoal.item2: Expand into tote bags, hoodies, and other merchandise.
longTermGoal.item3: Open a flagship store in strategic Bandung locations.

differentiation.title: What Makes Kaos EUY! Different
differentiation.subtitle: Four clear reasons people choose us for Bandung souvenir t-shirts.
differentiation.item1Description: Designs inspired by Bandung visuals and character that you will not find in generic souvenir stores.
differentiation.item2Description: Sundanese phrases, city icons, and historical themes are embedded into our collections.
differentiation.item3Description: Easy to order through digital channels and also available through offline touchpoints.
differentiation.item4Description: Packaging materials are selected to reduce waste while keeping product quality and presentation.

contactPage.title: Contact Kaos EUY!
contactPage.subtitle: Questions about products, custom requests, or order support? Reach us through these channels.
contactPage.intro: Our team is ready to help you with sizing, design direction, and order follow-up.

sizeGuidePage.title: Size Guide
sizeGuidePage.subtitle: Choose the fit that feels right before you order.
sizeGuidePage.note: Measurements are in centimeters and may vary by 1-2 cm due to production tolerance.
sizeGuidePage.tip1: Lay your favorite T-shirt flat on a table.
sizeGuidePage.tip2: Measure chest width from armpit to armpit.
sizeGuidePage.tip3: Measure body length from top shoulder to bottom hem.
sizeGuidePage.tip4: If you are between sizes, choose one size up for a relaxed fit.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Quick answers about ordering, customization, and shipping.
faqPage.q1Title: What is the minimum order quantity?
faqPage.q1Answer: You can order from 1 piece for personal orders. Bulk orders are available for larger quantities.
faqPage.q2Answer: Standard production is around 7-10 days depending on quantity and design complexity.
faqPage.q3Title: Can I upload my own design?
faqPage.q3Answer: Yes. You can upload your own file and place it on available print positions during customization.
faqPage.q4Answer: You can pay through the available Duitku channels shown during checkout.
faqPage.q5Title: Do you support online and offline purchase?
faqPage.q5Answer: Yes. Ordering is available online, and selected offline touchpoints are also available.
faqPage.q6Title: How can I track my order?
faqPage.q6Answer: Use the Order Lookup page with your order ID, email, and lookup token.

termsPage.title: Terms & Conditions
termsPage.subtitle: Please review these terms before placing an order.
termsPage.section1Body: By placing an order on Kaos EUY!, you agree to provide accurate details and follow the ordering process shown on this website.
termsPage.section2Item1: Colors and print appearance may vary slightly across screens and production output.
termsPage.section2Item2: Customers are responsible for uploaded design content and usage rights.
termsPage.section2Item3: Custom products cannot be canceled once production has started.
termsPage.section3Item1: Orders are processed after payment is successfully created/confirmed.
termsPage.section3Item2: Payment channels are provided by integrated partners and may change without prior notice.
termsPage.section3Item3: Any payment issue should be reported immediately through our support channels.
termsPage.section4Item1: Estimated production time is informational and may change during peak periods.
termsPage.section4Item2: Shipping duration depends on destination and courier service.
termsPage.section4Item3: Tracking details will be shared once available.
termsPage.section5Body: If there is a production defect or incorrect item, contact us with evidence within 2x24 hours after receiving the product.
termsPage.section6Body: For any legal or service-related inquiry, please contact us via the Contact page.
